title: ADC and Supporter Looking for Platinum - Diamond Team
body:
Hey,
ADC and Support Main are looking for a Team to Flex and Play Tournaments. We are looking for an EUW team to join. Just wishing to learn, progress and having a nice time.
Willing to play the Champs that are needed. We are open to criticism and always trying to improve .
Discord and Teamspeak available aswell
Links to OP.GG
Nirolex: http://euw.op.gg/summoner/userName=Nirolex 
BloodElfs: https://euw.op.gg/summoner/userName=BloodElfs
Add us in in-game client for further details:
**Nirolex **or **BloodElfs**

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
